name: Paris, France
description: The City of Light, famous for its art, culture, fashion, and iconic landmarks like the Eiffel Tower and Louvre Museum.

name: Tokyo, Japan
description: A vibrant metropolis blending traditional culture with cutting-edge technology, offering incredible cuisine and experiences.

name: Cape Town, South Africa
description: Stunning coastal city beneath Table Mountain, known for its wine regions, wildlife, and rich cultural heritage.

name: Rio de Janeiro, Brazil
description: Famous for Copacabana beach, Christ the Redeemer statue, and vibrant Carnival celebrations.

name: New York, USA
description: The city that never sleeps, featuring iconic skylines, Broadway shows, world-class museums, and diverse neighborhoods.
